name: Abyssal Nightstalker
text: Whenever Abyssal Nightstalker attacks and isn't blocked, defending player discards a card.

name: Air Elemental
text: Flying
flavor: As insubstantial, and as powerful, as the wind that carries it.

name: Alaborn Cavalier
text: Whenever Alaborn Cavalier attacks, you may tap target creature.
flavor: "Course he ran! I wouldn't want to stare down that barrel, either!"\n—Alaborn soldier

name: Alaborn Grenadier
text: Vigilance
flavor: "Ever proud, ever vigilant."\n—Grenadier motto

name: Alaborn Musketeer
text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor: Muskets gave the Alaborn army an advantage it had long lacked—air defense.

name: Alaborn Trooper
flavor: "I dedicate my body to my country\nAnd my life to my King."\n—Alaborn Soldier's Oath

name: Alaborn Veteran
text: {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

name: Alaborn Zealot
text: When Alaborn Zealot blocks a creature, destroy that creature and Alaborn Zealot.

name: Alluring Scent
text: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.
flavor: No earthly armor is protection against this sweetness.

name: Ancient Craving
text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
flavor: "Knowledge demands sacrifice."\n—Tojira, swamp queen

name: Angel of Fury
text: Flying\nWhen Angel of Fury dies, you may shuffle it into its owner's library.

name: Angel of Mercy
text: Flying\nWhen Angel of Mercy enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

name: Angelic Blessing
text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor: The man who rose up to fight was not the same man knocked down.

name: Angelic Wall
text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)\nFlying
flavor: Be at peace, and observe its beauty. Be at war, and feel its justice.

name: Apprentice Sorcerer
text: {T}: Apprentice Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

name: Archangel
text: Flying, vigilance

name: Armageddon
text: Destroy all lands.
flavor: War destroys more than just the land. War destroys hope.

name: Armored Galleon
text: Armored Galleon can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
flavor: "Information equals profits. Our merchants sell it, or our pirates use it."\n—Jefan, Talas ship captain

name: Armored Griffin
text: Flying, vigilance

name: Barbtooth Wurm
flavor: In its lair lies a carpet of bones.

name: Bargain
text: Target opponent draws a card.\nYou gain 7 life.
flavor: Bargaining with a goblin is like trading with a child; both believe they already own everything.

name: Bear Cub
flavor: Every little cub has its mother's teeth to guard it.\n—Elvish saying

name: Bee Sting
text: Bee Sting deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: Busy as a bumblebee, blistered as a goblin.\n—Alaborn saying

name: Blaze
text: Blaze deals X damage to target creature or player.
flavor: "This isn't what I meant by ‘facing the heat of battle!'"\n—Jefan, Talas ship captain

name: Bloodcurdling Scream
text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "I have all the weapons my enemies have—and far deeper rage."\n—Tojira, swamp queen

name: Breath of Life
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Brimstone Dragon
text: Flying, haste

name: Brutal Nightstalker
text: When Brutal Nightstalker enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent discard a card.

name: Chorus of Woe
text: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: When nightstalkers sing, nothing in creation sleeps.

name: Coastal Wizard
text: {T}: Return Coastal Wizard and another target creature to their owners' hands. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

name: Coercion
text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor: "Human tenderness is simply weakness in a pretty package."\n—Tojira, swamp queen

name: Cruel Edict
text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature.
flavor: "Such a fragile organ, the brain."\n—Tojira, swamp queen

name: Cunning Giant
text: If Cunning Giant is unblocked, you may have it assign its combat damage to a creature defending player controls.

name: Dakmor Bat
text: Flying
flavor: The bat thrives on what underestimates it.

name: Dakmor Plague
text: Dakmor Plague deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor: The tiniest cough can be deadlier than the fiercest dragon.

name: Dakmor Scorpion
flavor: A scorpion this big you won't find curled up in your boot. Maybe around your boot, but not in it.

name: Dakmor Sorceress
text: Dakmor Sorceress's power is equal to the number of Swamps you control.

name: Dark Offering
text: Destroy target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.
flavor: "Our greatest hope has become our enemy's greatest triumph."\n—Restela, Alaborn marshal

name: Deathcoil Wurm
text: You may have Deathcoil Wurm assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

name: Deep Wood
text: Cast Deep Wood only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.\nPrevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by attacking creatures.

name: Déjà Vu
text: Return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: History is the study of repetition.

name: Denizen of the Deep
text: When Denizen of the Deep enters the battlefield, return each other creature you control to its owner's hand.

name: Earthquake
text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

name: Exhaustion
text: Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during his or her next untap step.

name: Extinguish
text: Counter target sorcery spell.

name: Eye Spy
text: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card into his or her graveyard.

name: False Summoning
text: Counter target creature spell.

name: Festival of Trokin
text: You gain 2 life for each creature you control.
flavor: Everyone loves a good sale.

name: Foul Spirit
text: Flying\nWhen Foul Spirit enters the battlefield, sacrifice a land.

name: Goblin Cavaliers
flavor: They get along so well with their goats because they're practically goats themselves.

name: Goblin Firestarter
text: Sacrifice Goblin Firestarter: Goblin Firestarter deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

name: Goblin General
text: Whenever Goblin General attacks, Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: Lead, follow, or run around like crazy.

name: Goblin Glider
text: Flying\nGoblin Glider can't block.
flavor: The goblins call the gliders "death from above." Everyone else calls them "clods in the clouds."

name: Goblin Lore
text: Draw four cards, then discard three cards at random.
flavor: "I done forgot more than you'll ever know, pipsqueak."\n"Yeah—that's your problem."

name: Goblin Matron
text: When Goblin Matron enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

name: Goblin Mountaineer
text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor: Goblin mountaineer, barely keeps his family fed.

name: Goblin Piker
flavor: Once he'd worked out which end of the thing was sharp, he was promoted to guard duty.

name: Goblin Raider
text: Goblin Raider can't block.
flavor: "I seen lots o' fights. To win ya gotta bash hard and not get bashed back."\n—Goblin grunt

name: Goblin War Cry
text: Target opponent chooses a creature he or she controls. Other creatures he or she controls can't block this turn.
flavor: "Goblins cry, soldiers fly.\nStones fly, soldiers die!"

name: Goblin War Strike
text: Goblin War Strike deals damage equal to the number of Goblins you control to target player.

name: Golden Bear
flavor: The elvish scout was scrupulous about the truth. She told the traders that gold lay nearby.

name: Hand of Death
text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
flavor: The touch of death is never gentle.

name: Harmony of Nature
text: Tap any number of untapped creatures you control. You gain 4 life for each creature tapped this way.

name: Hidden Horror
text: When Hidden Horror enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a creature card.

name: Hurricane
text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

name: Ironhoof Ox
text: Ironhoof Ox can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavor: The good news is it's vegetarian. The bad news is it just doesn't like you.

name: Jagged Lightning
text: Jagged Lightning deals 3 damage to each of two target creatures.

name: Just Fate
text: Cast Just Fate only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.\nDestroy target attacking creature.

name: Kiss of Death
text: Kiss of Death deals 4 damage to target opponent. You gain 4 life.
flavor: "I'd sooner lock lips with a viper. At least I might walk away from that."\n—Elvish scout

name: Lava Axe
text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player.
flavor: Meant to cut through the body and burn straight to the soul.

name: Lone Wolf
text: You may have Lone Wolf assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

name: Lurking Nightstalker
text: Whenever Lurking Nightstalker attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: The shadows know.

name: Lynx
text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor: Rarely seen, hardly heard, never caught.

name: Magma Giant
text: When Magma Giant enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

name: Mind Rot
text: Target player discards two cards.

name: Moaning Spirit
text: Flying
flavor: The dead sing their own lullabies.

name: Monstrous Growth
text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
flavor: The nightstalkers' little game of tease-the-squirrel suddenly took an unexpected turn.

name: Muck Rats
flavor: "Just as some fool said it couldn't get worse, the rats began to show up."\n—Alaborn soldier

name: Mystic Denial
text: Counter target creature or sorcery spell.

name: Natural Spring
text: Target player gains 8 life.
flavor: The dying ask for water because they know it contains life.

name: Nature's Lore
text: Search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: "Every seed planted is another lesson the forest can teach us."\n—Arathel, elvish queen

name: Nightstalker Engine
text: Nightstalker Engine's power is equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
flavor: Part metal, part bone, and all death.

name: Norwood Archers
text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor: "‘Air superiority?' Not while our archers scan the skies."\n—Elvish scout

name: Norwood Priestess
text: {T}: You may put a green creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

name: Norwood Ranger
flavor: Some trees bear deadly fruit.

name: Norwood Riders
text: Norwood Riders can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavor: "Trade my moose? Sure—when I find a horse that can spear ten goblins at a time!"

name: Norwood Warrior
text: Whenever Norwood Warrior becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "The woods hold peace for those who desire it, but those who seek battle will find me."

name: Obsidian Giant
flavor: After a while, ships stopped sailing within his reach.

name: Ogre Arsonist
text: When Ogre Arsonist enters the battlefield, destroy target land.

name: Ogre Berserker
text: Haste
flavor: The machine does the growling, so the ogre's free to smile.

name: Ogre Taskmaster
text: Ogre Taskmaster can't block.
flavor: Three little goblins, enjoying their brew. One bumped an ogre, and then there were two.

name: Ogre Warrior
flavor: Assault and battery included.

name: Path of Peace
text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.
flavor: "You could die famous or you could die old. I chose old."\n—Former soldier

name: Piracy
text: Until end of turn, you may tap lands you don't control for mana. Spend this mana only to cast spells.
flavor: The sea gives, and the sea takes. Some just help with the taking.

name: Plated Wurm
flavor: "I'd hate to see the bird that could get this wurm!"\n—Alaborn soldier

name: Predatory Nightstalker
text: When Predatory Nightstalker enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent sacrifice a creature.

name: Prowling Nightstalker
text: Prowling Nightstalker can't be blocked except by black creatures.
flavor: Silent as a serpent, twisted as a lone bog tree, evil as Tojira's heart.

name: Raging Goblin
text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

name: Raiding Nightstalker
text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor: "Our steeds need food, water, stabling. Theirs just need prey."\n—Restela, Alaborn marshal

name: Rain of Daggers
text: Destroy all creatures target opponent controls. You lose 2 life for each creature destroyed this way.
flavor: Knives in the sky, cries in the air, and blood on the ground.

name: Raise Dead
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "Life from death is part of the natural cycle. This is merely a shortcut."\n—Tojira, swamp queen

name: Rally the Troops
text: Cast Rally the Troops only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.\nUntap all creatures you control.

name: Ravenous Rats
text: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

name: Razorclaw Bear
text: Whenever Razorclaw Bear becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: One razorclaw is three bears too many.\n—Elvish saying

name: Relentless Assault
text: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

name: Remove
text: Cast Remove only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.\nReturn target attacking creature to its owner's hand.

name: Renewing Touch
text: Shuffle any number of target creature cards from your graveyard into your library.
flavor: Death just encourages life the more.

name: Return of the Nightstalkers
text: Return all Nightstalker permanent cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. Then destroy all Swamps you control.

name: Righteous Charge
text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: "Bravery shines brightest in a pure soul."\n—Restela, Alaborn marshal

name: Righteous Fury
text: Destroy all tapped creatures. You gain 2 life for each creature destroyed this way.

name: River Bear
text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
flavor: The bears had been isolated on an island for hundreds of years, until the island sank and the bears didn't.

name: Salvage
text: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.
flavor: "What was taken shall be restored."\n—Arathel, elvish queen

name: Screeching Drake
text: Flying\nWhen Screeching Drake enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

name: Sea Drake
text: Flying\nWhen Sea Drake enters the battlefield, return two target lands you control to their owner's hand.

name: Sleight of Hand
text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

name: Spitting Earth
text: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

name: Steam Catapult
text: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.
flavor: "You idiots! Turn it around! Turn it around!"

name: Steam Frigate
text: Steam Frigate can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
flavor: "Is it merchants or is it pirates?"\n"It's Talas—there's no difference."

name: Stone Rain
text: Destroy target land.
flavor: There goes the neighborhood!

name: Swarm of Rats
text: Swarm of Rats's power is equal to the number of Rats you control.

name: Sylvan Basilisk
text: Whenever Sylvan Basilisk becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature.

name: Sylvan Yeti
text: Sylvan Yeti's power is equal to the number of cards in your hand.
flavor: The deeper the wood, the greater its strength.

name: Talas Air Ship
text: Flying
flavor: "Their ships pollute our air as they themselves pollute our forest."\n—Arathel, elvish queen

name: Talas Explorer
text: Flying\nWhen Talas Explorer enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand.

name: Talas Merchant
flavor: The trader let loose a laugh that made all around him check their purses.

name: Talas Researcher
text: {T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.
flavor: From time, knowledge.\nFrom knowledge, power.

name: Talas Scout
text: Flying
flavor: "Scouting a battle before you fight it is just good business."\n—Jefan, Talas ship captain

name: Talas Warrior
text: Talas Warrior can't be blocked.
flavor: The sea is in their blood. Literally.

name: Temple Acolyte
text: When Temple Acolyte enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor: Young, yes. Inexperienced, yes. Weak? Don't count on it.

name: Temple Elder
text: {T}: You gain 1 life. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.
flavor: "Give us breath. Give us life. Prepare us for the day we make."\n—The Alaborn "Rite of Battle"

name: Temporal Manipulation
text: Take an extra turn after this one.
flavor: Doing something at the last minute isn't so bad when you can make that minute last.

name: Theft of Dreams
text: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.
flavor: "First they fight, then they sleep, then they dream. And finally I receive my reward."

name: Tidal Surge
text: Tap up to three target creatures without flying.
flavor: Four little goblins, trapped by the sea. One teased a serpent, and then there were three.

name: Time Ebb
text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
flavor: "The ogre had come from out of the blue, so that's where I sent it back."\n—Talas wizard

name: Touch of Brilliance
text: Draw two cards.
flavor: "I don't want what I don't have. I want more of what I do have."

name: Town Sentry
text: Whenever Town Sentry blocks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: "So he gots a sword. Big deal."\n"Yeah, it's a big deal—it's a big sword!"\n—Two goblins outside the gates of Trokin

name: Tree Monkey
text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor: "They serve the world best on a platter with shallots and onions."\n—Talas sailor

name: Tremor
text: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
flavor: One little goblin shook up the ground. When the dust cleared, no one was found.

name: Trokin High Guard
flavor: Battle tempers soldiers as fire tempers steel.

name: Undo
text: Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.

name: Untamed Wilds
text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Vampiric Spirit
text: Flying\nWhen Vampiric Spirit enters the battlefield, you lose 4 life.

name: Vengeance
text: Destroy target tapped creature.
flavor: A bullet renders all sizes equal.

name: Volcanic Hammer
text: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: Fire finds its form in the heat of the forge.

name: Volunteer Militia
flavor: People fight hardest on their own soil.

name: Warrior's Stand
text: Cast Warrior's Stand only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.\nCreatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Wild Griffin
text: Flying
flavor: Two little goblins, out in the sun. Down came a griffin, and then there was one.

name: Wild Ox
text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor: It has the run of the swamps, and it knows it.

name: Wildfire
text: Each player sacrifices four lands. Wildfire deals 4 damage to each creature.

name: Wind Sail
text: One or two target creatures gain flying until end of turn.
flavor: It pays to be at home both on the sea and in the sky.
